short_summary: Education Coordinator for the Lower Fraser River area
description: Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires Contractors to provide delivery and coordination services for the Stream to Sea program. The services include delivery and coordination of salmon eggs, educational philosophy for classroom incubators, curriculum in-services for teacher groups, and storm drain marking programs for citizen science. Contractor will work in the geographic area, require frequent field visits, and subject to geographic area where the Stream to Sea program operate.
full_summary:
# Education Coordinator - Lower Fraser River Area, BC (Awarded Bid)

## Tender Overview
The Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of educational services and program delivery for the Stream to Sea program in the Lower Fraser River area.

## Project Details
- **Job Title (English/French):** Education Coordinator – Lower Fraser River Area, BC (B)/Coordonateur de l’enseignment pour la région du Bas Fraser en Colombie-Britannique (B)
- **Reference Number:** cb-737-95127874
- **Amendment Number:** 4
- **Solicitation Number:** 30004527A
- **Publication Date:** 2023-10-18
- **Tender Closing Date and Time:** 2023-11-07T14:00:00
- **Expiry Date:** 2023-11-07 (Tender status: Expiré)
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-01
- **Expected Contract End Date:** 2026-03-31

## Procurement Information
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity:** British Columbia
- **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia, Canada
- **Supply Arrangement Type:** Bid

## Project Description
DFO seeks a contractor to provide educational services and program delivery for the Stream to Sea program, targeting the Lower Fraser River area of British Columbia. Key services include:
* Delivering and coordinating educational events for teachers, students, and the general public
* Coordinating and assisting with classroom incubator setup, salmon egg delivery, and teacher in-service training
* Providing educational support for teachers with saltwater aquariums and participating in spring fry releases

## Attachments
The full Request for Proposal document can be accessed at:
- English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22537/30004527a---rfp-%28eng.pdf
- Français: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22537/30004527a---rfp-%28fr.pdf

## Contact Information
For inquiries, please contact:
Joshua Bereza
DFO.Tenders-Soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
(343) 576-8144
